name: UKCoreEmergencyCareDischargeStatus
title: UK Core Emergency Care Discharge Status
description: A set of codes that describe the outcome of, or status of a patient on discharge from, an Emergency Care Department attendance.

contains.display: Admitted to other Hospital within Local Health Board
Admitted to same Hospital within Local Health Board
Dead on arrival at hospital
Died in Department
Emergency room admission, died in emergency room
Left care setting after initial assessment
Left care setting before initial assessment
Left care setting before treatment completed
No Planned Follow-up
Patient Dead on Arrival
Patient Self Discharged without Clinical Consent
Planned Follow-up at Accident and Emergency Department
Referred to GP
Referred to Other Healthcare Professional
Referred to Outpatient Department
Streamed from emergency department to ambulatory emergency care service following initial assessment
Streamed from emergency department to dental service following initial assessment
Streamed from emergency department to falls service following initial assessment
Streamed from emergency department to frailty service following initial assessment
Streamed from emergency department to general practitioner following initial assessment
Streamed from emergency department to inpatient unit following initial assessment
Streamed from emergency department to mental health service following initial assessment
Streamed from emergency department to ophthalmology service following initial assessment
Streamed from emergency department to pharmacy service following initial assessment
Streamed from emergency department to urgent care service following initial assessment
Streamed to emergency department following initial assessment
Transferred to different Local Health Board
Treatment completed
